name: Space Inversion 2.
description:
Space Inversion is the highly rated arcade Invader style shooter and it's back with a vengeance!
bigger and better than ever before and now featuring a new Arcade mode with regenerating aliens and power ups to even the odds.
New bonus "Meteor Storm" and "Flying Saucer" rounds add yet more thrills and the chance to rack points up for extra lives.
There's also a Classic mode for those wanting a slower paced more traditional game.

** Not Sure ? try our brand new FREE version. Simply play to unlock all the features **


Space Inversion 2 now features in lanscape widescreen mode (auto orientation supported) and offers 6 different controls systems including Tilt,Slide,Butons and Joystick configurations.
Fire modes include manual, semi-auto and auto fire.
Game Center Leaderboards lets you complete for the best scores in the galaxy.

* Top 50 Paid App - USA
* #2 Paid App - Australia
